title: Project-Based Science Education Design Competency Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science education theories and introduction to early childhood education
context.additional_context: Training in designing field-oriented education using VR simulations in smartphone-centric, resource-constrained technological environments

learning_goals: Participants can design and implement science education modules for young children using PBL methodology at least three times
One can produce core deliverables for each phase of the instructional design process (analysis-design-development-experiment-evaluation) with over 80% completeness
One can enhance communication skills and leadership capabilities through role distribution and collaboration in team-based projects

resources: Activity Case Database by Early Childhood Development Stages
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
